    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Handles the request to start the game within the current lobby. This operation requires the user to be in a lobby and to have admin privileges.
      Specified by:
      startGame in interface ClientServerMessageExecutor

    • quitLobby

      public void quitLobby()
      Handles the request to quit the current lobby. If the user is in a game associated with the lobby, it will be terminated.
      Specified by:
      quitLobby in interface ClientServerMessageExecutor

      Handles the request to play a card in the game.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface ClientServerMessageExecutor
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - The index of the card to play.
      coordinateIndex - The index of the coordinate to play the card on.
      faceUp - Flag indicating whether the card should be played face up.
